label: Agriculture
description: Agriculture involves cultivation of plants, farming of animals, and other related activities for the production of food, fibers, medicinal plants, and other products used to sustain and enhance human life.

label: Automotive
description: The automotive industry encompasses the design, development, manufacture, marketing, and sale of motor vehicles such as cars, trucks, motorcycles, and their parts and accessories.

label: Banking
description: Banking involves financial institutions that provide services such as accepting deposits, lending funds, facilitating money transfers, and offering various financial products and investment opportunities.

label: Construction
description: Construction industry includes the building, installation, or assembly of physical structures such as houses, commercial buildings, infrastructure projects, and other civil engineering works.

label: Education
description: The education sector focuses on providing learning, knowledge acquisition, and skill development through formal institutions like schools, colleges, universities, vocational training centers, and online platforms.

label: E-commerce
description: E-commerce refers to buying and selling products or services over the internet, utilizing online platforms, electronic payment systems, and digital marketing strategies.

label: Energy
description: Energy industry involves the extraction, production, refining, distribution, and utilization of various sources of energy such as fossil fuels, renewable energy, nuclear power, and electricity.

label: Finance
description: Finance industry deals with the management, investment, and allocation of funds, as well as providing financial advice, insurance services, and wealth management solutions.

label: Healthcare
description: Healthcare sector encompasses a wide range of services, including medical facilities, hospitals, clinics, pharmaceuticals, health insurance, telemedicine, and healthcare technology.

label: Information Technology (IT)
description: IT industry involves the development, implementation, and management of computer-based technologies, software applications, hardware devices, IT services, and data management systems.

label: Manufacturing
description: Manufacturing sector involves the production, processing, and fabrication of goods using raw materials, machines, labor, and industrial processes on a large scale.

label: Marketing and Advertising
description: Marketing and advertising industry focuses on promoting products, services, or brands through strategic campaigns, market research, public relations, creative design, and media platforms.

label: Pharmaceuticals
description: Pharmaceutical industry specializes in the research, development, production, and distribution of pharmaceutical drugs for medical treatment and prevention of diseases.

label: Retail
description: Retail sector involves the sale of consumer goods or services directly to individuals through offline stores, e-commerce platforms, catalogues, or mobile applications.

label: Telecommunications
description: Telecommunications industry deals with the transmission of voice, video, data, and information over long distances using various technologies such as wired networks, wireless communication, and internet protocols.

label: Aerospace
description: Involves the design, development, manufacturing, and operation of aircraft, spacecraft, satellites, and related systems.

label: Biotechnology
description: Focuses on utilizing biological processes, organisms, or systems to develop products or technologies that improve human health, agriculture, and environmental sustainability.

label: Chemical
description: Deals with the production, refinement, and distribution of chemicals used in various sectors such as pharmaceuticals, agriculture, manufacturing, and consumer goods.

label: Defense
description: Specializes in the development, production, and maintenance of military equipment, weapons, and technology for national security and defense purposes.

label: Environmental
description: Focuses on addressing and mitigating environmental issues such as pollution, climate change, resource conservation, and sustainable practices.

label: Hospitality
description: Involves services and accommodations provided to individuals or groups during travel, tourism, events, or dining experiences, typically within hotels, restaurants, or resorts.

label: Insurance
description: Provides financial protection against potential risks and losses, offering coverage for individuals or organizations against property damage, liability claims, and other unforeseen circumstances.

label: Legal
description: Involves the provision of legal advice, representation, and advocacy for individuals or organizations in matters related to law, regulations, contracts, and disputes.

label: Media
description: Engages in the creation, production, and distribution of content through various channels like television, radio, newspapers, magazines, online platforms, and social media.

label: Nonprofit
description: Operates for charitable, humanitarian, or social causes, aiming to make a positive impact on society without generating profits for its members or shareholders.

label: Pharmaceuticals
description: Focuses on the research, development, production, and distribution of pharmaceutical drugs for medical treatment and prevention of diseases.

label: Real Estate
description: Involves the purchase, sale, rental, management, and development of properties such as land, residential buildings, commercial spaces, and industrial facilities.

label: Research and Development (R&D)
description: Focuses on scientific investigation, innovation, and technological advancements to improve existing products, develop new products, or solve complex problems.

label: Transportation and Logistics
description: Deals with the movement, storage, and management of goods, materials, and people through various modes such as air, land, sea, or rail.

label: Utilities
description: Involves the generation, distribution, and supply of essential services like electricity, water, gas, and telecommunications infrastructure necessary for daily life and business operations.
